edits.original_text: and out at that arch of light at the other end,
edits.corrected_text: and out at that arch of light, at the other end,

edits.original_text: for a moment, with a look in which regard for him and trustfulness in him were strikingly blended
edits.corrected_text: for a moment, with a look in which regard for him and trustfulness in him, were strikingly blended

edits.original_text: that papa had abandoned the idea.
edits.corrected_text: that papa had abandoned the idea.
